MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton. We are aware of previous power cuts in your area and we apologise for this. Our emergency response team have arrived at the Butterburn substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:09pm on Saturday, 26 December 2020
